roleset.name: killing, violence
roleset.note: BLOODSHED-N NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to shed.xml (from bloodshed.04-n)

example.text: Nonetheless, it is the right hour that human rights organisations, OIC, Security Council and international media must play their active role so as to prevent wretched treatment meted out to Muslim minority, and to stop their bloodshed in Burma.
